scripts.dev: echo 'WARNING: must run `npm run dev:durable_objects` in other window' && npm run build && npx @transformation-dev/wrangler pages dev --binding NODE_ENV=development SENDGRID_LOGIN=$SENDGRID_LOGIN TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE=$TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE DEBUG="blueprint:*" --mount transformation-durable_objects=./durable_objects --do TEMPORAL_ENTITY=TemporalEntity@transformation-durable_objects COUNTER=PreviewCounter@transformation-durable_objects --kv SESSIONS --proxy 3000 -- vite --host
scripts.build: npm run build:version.json && npm run build:durable_objects && npm run build:ui
scripts.start: env BROWSER=none wrangler pages dev --binding NODE_ENV=development SENDGRID_LOGIN=$SENDGRID_LOGIN TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE=$TESTING_OVERRIDE_CODE DEBUG="blueprint:*" --mount transformation-durable_objects=./durable_objects --do TEMPORAL_ENTITY=TemporalEntity@transformation-durable_objects COUNTER=PreviewCounter@transformation-durable_objects --kv SESSIONS --proxy 3001 -- vite preview --host
scripts.build-and-start: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.coverage:build: npm run build:durable_objects && npx vite build --config vite-coverage.config.js
scripts.coverage:build-and-start: npm run coverage:build && npm run start
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage:c8 && npm run coverage:nyc
